list.description:
CELEBRATING 1,911 reputation!

I made this sight specially for this event upon seeing I had 1911! So, enjoy!

Also, I'll be holding a giveaway for passing 100 subscribers on YouTube, and also another one soon for when we hit 2k here! So stay tuned!

MBG = mega big
x = on cross hair
up +left/right = the png is over the horizotal line and Left/right
down+left/right = same as up but inverted
BG = Big
SPAA = sight made spesific for SPAA
Cross = custom cross with png
CrossPLus = custom cross with extar sight setings and png
Tail = Tail is on cross hair
Boobs= ther on the horizontal line

Contact me on my dc if you want crosshair that i cant poste do to guide lines

Instructions : Inside the compressed file

相同倍率可通用的瞄具，请不要把它放进all_tanks里面。
用的时候，请注意对照检查炮手瞄准镜缩放倍率。
Same magnification universal . Please do not put it in all_tanks
When using, please pay attention to checking the magnification of the gunner's sight

Прицел сделан на заказ с персонажем Владилена Милизе из аниме "86"

Прицельная сетка с парочкой сестричек Chocola и Vanilla из NEKOPARA на скрине приближение 3х

По заказу от @Ванилла196 сделал сразу два прицела

Так же вы можете писать мне в лс для заказа прицела type_alpha1 работаем мы на пару так что скорее всего заказ выполним быстро

Так же у меня есть свой полк, название - Sora no Otoshimono

Full&Semi historical sights Pack
完全史实&半史实瞄具合集

My Pack including:
Lots of Full&Semi historical sights,
and a few fictional sights.
No matter what you like, i believe you can find something to enjoy.

Now, my pack has more and more content, so later I ll make a major update, completely splitting the original pack into two parts ,completely separating the historical sights from others.

我的合集包括：
大量史实瞄具，大量半史实瞄具，少数虚构瞄具。
我认为无论你喜欢什么风格，在这个合集里都能找到你想要的瞄具。故名。

我最近计划对此合集进行重大调整。计划将要把史实瞄具和虚构瞄具分开。
